column4: Can anyone tell me if an Imation 4.7GB/2 hour DVD-R will work as an install disc?
sure just burn the iso onto it

I was asking because I tried it once, and it finished burning properly, but when I used the Boot Menu to Boot From Disk it simply booted into Windows, so I think I'll try Yehweh's advice and go with a CD-R... just have to get one.
